title: Zeiton TC 7/25: Joe Manchin, 'Black Panther 2', Samantha Bee, Choco Taco, Brazil, Hulu
itunes:title: Zeiton TC 7/25: Joe Manchin, 'Black Panther 2', Samantha Bee, Choco Taco, Brazil, Hulu
description:
In this edition of Zeiton TC, Jack and Miles find themselves upright on miracle status as they discuss discuss Joe Manchin getting COVID, the trailer for 'Black Panther 2: Wakanda Forever', Samantha Bee's 'Full Frontal' getting cancelled, the sunsetting of Choco Taco, the Brazilian presidential election, and Hulu blocking Democrat ads!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
